title: The Board of Directors — Current Members & Governance Structure

sources.label: Springfield SD 19
sources.title: Board of Directors
sources.summary: Springfield School Board page with current board members, meeting schedules, position zones, and governance information.

takeaways: Springfield's board consists of 7 elected members — 5 from geographic zones and 2 at-large.
All members serve 4-year staggered terms; elections are held in May of odd-numbered years.
Regular meetings are the 2nd Monday at 7:00 PM; Work Sessions are the 4th Monday at 5:30 PM.
The board chair is selected by the board no later than the first regular meeting after July 1 each year.
A quorum is 4 members (majority of 7); committees are advisory and do not take binding action.

knowledgeCheck.question: Springfield SD 19 has a 7-member school board.
knowledgeCheck.explanation: Springfield SD 19 has a 7-member board of directors — 5 members elected from geographic zones and 2 elected at-large by all district voters.

knowledgeCheck.question: Regular board meetings are held on:
knowledgeCheck.explanation: Regular board meetings are held on the 2nd Monday of each month at 7:00 PM. Work Sessions are held on the 4th Monday at 5:30 PM.
